description:
Offset a geo feature by a particular amount.

monitoring.monitorlib.transformations.RelativeTranslation, as defined in monitoring/monitorlib/transformations.py

$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

degrees_east.description: Number of degrees of longitude east to translate.

degrees_north.description: Number of degrees of latitude north to translate.

meters_east.description: Number of meters east to translate.

meters_north.description: Number of meters north to translate.

meters_up.description: Number of meters upward to translate.
